channel.title: How do I upload a Webclient to a website so that others may connect to it
channel.description: So I've done everything with portfowarding and messed around with everything so that other people may connect to it, but now my trouble is, actually putting it on a website so people may play it. If you could help me please i'd appreciate it.

item.title: How do I upload a Webclient to a website so that others may connect to it
item.dc:creator: @zingerman111 zingerman111
item.description:
@zingerman111 wrote:

or go to rspscoding.org and make a client copy html code by looking at source copy applet and
there you go use whatever site you got and insert html
